ThingDef.label: human paste meal
ThingDef.description: A greasy slime made from processed human meat.

li.label: ate human paste
li.description: I'm eating human flesh that's been processed into a greasy slime. They didn't even get the dignity of being cooked by hand...

ThingDef.label: human brick meal
ThingDef.description: Dehydrated human paste, wrapped in polymer made from inedible food-parts. The bright color makes them easily distinguishable from other nutrient bricks.

li.label: ate nutrient brick
li.description: Human flesh, processed into a small brick. How did we get to this point? People are getting chopped up, churned, dried, pickled, eaten, stewed, ground to paste - I can't stand it!
